name: Tower Wars: Castle Battle
description:
Tower Wars is a puzzle and strategy casual game. You can control your soldier to gain more power point, rescue his allies, save the hostage... most important of all, defeat the Soldier Boss! To defeat all the enemies, you should collect enough power point to make sure that your soldier is more powerful than all your enemies. For this, you should have a plan at the beginning of the battle.
Plan your own offensive and defensive strategy with your soldiers.


Game Features:
● Level up your hero.
● Lots of levels.
● 3 different modes and different challenges.
● Easy but strategic.
